author: martinc
msg: Make getOutputStream() part of the FileItem interface, to allow
implementations other than DefaultFileItem to be used.

author: jericho
msg: - Use ByteArrayOutputStream to prevent memory consumption just like
the same purpose of the previous StringBuffer use.
Patched by Park Jongjin <ecogeo at dreamwiz.com>

author: jericho
msg: Whenever StringBuffer and String class are used and the MULTI-BYTEs support
should be considered, it should be treated with raw character rather than byte.
Reported and patched by Park Jong-Jin (ecogeo at dreamwiz.com)
